ygData.subject: Re: Forage Skill
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh my gosh - you re telling me those tasty pies I bought at the inn contain rat or dark elf meat!  THE HORROR! I think we need to investigate whether we need
ygData.messageBody:
Oh my gosh - you're telling me those tasty pies I bought at the inn contain
rat or dark elf meat! THE HORROR!

I think we need to investigate whether we need to establish a Norrathian
Food & Drug Administration....

Slyde of Xegony


----- Original Message -----
From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, June 29, 1999 9:13 AM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Forage Skill


> From: Rokenn Swiftsong <rokenn@...>
>
> Yes foraged food is heavy, that is one of the reasons I took up baking :)
> Most of the foraged food can be cooked into a much lighter (0.1 Wgt) food.
> Some will even give back two for one (like vegie soup). Plus with baking
> all that meat you get as loot (wolf, rat, lion, lizard, dark elf, etc...)
> can be turned into tasty treats. The only problem with baking right now
is
<snip>
